title: Highest prices paid for rare baseball postcards
author: BeanTown

posts.post_title: Highest prices paid for rare baseball postcards
posts.post_content: Looking for player or team postcards from 1903 thru 1920.  Please send me a scan of what you have.   Will be happy to tade or buy.  Rare series postcards and HOFers go straight to the top of my want list.  Does not matter if postally stamped as I think that should be a multiplier !!!
